Hutaib Electricals Raceway Cabletrays









What does Hutaib Electricals have in store in Raceway Cabletrays?


Raceway Cables are used to route wires through a discreet wall cord concealer that will improve the aesthetics of any industry as well as keep their electric cables protected at a very affordable price. Hutaib Electricals specialises in raceway for industrial applications A raceway in cable management is essentially any rigid enclosed or semi-enclosed channel that protects, routes and hides cables and wires. Surface raceway is an excellent choice for concealing unsightly wires in a number of settings: home theaters, offices, conference rooms, workstations, and more.Hutaib Electricals specialises in raceways that are at an affordable price to run networking and power cables throughout IT Companies.


Industrial Cable Tray Raceways that we manufacture are extensively utilized in IT industries. These cable raceways are used to carry networking cables and are available in two kinds that are Floor Raceways and Ceiling Raceways. The floor raceways come with dividers that are used to separate the cables. The covers are present in two forms either welded type or screw type. However, in ceiling raceways, push fit type of cover is found. These cable raceways can either be per-galvanized or powder coated. Raceways are widely utilised in IT industries to carry networking cables. There are two types of raceways that are presented in cable management i.e. Floor Raceways & Ceiling Raceways. The floor raceways are available with dividers to separate the cables. The covers are presented in either welded type or screw type. Whereas in ceiling raceways, push fit type of cover is offered. These items are either Pre- galvanized or powder coated.


Features:
●  Raceways are known not only for its excellent quality but is also known for its cost-effective cable protection systems
●  These fittings provide cable protection in both lay-in and pull-through cable installations
●  Provides superior strength for any dry location
●  Single and dual compartment attractive raceway design
●  Provides functionality and flexibility with aesthetics for single or dual service applications


Raceways/Trunking Tray Types


C Channel Accessories:
‘C' Channel is used to give a path and to support the cable and is highly appreciated for its durability and long service life. These channels are available in different specifications to the clients at Hutaib Electricals.


Floor Junction Boxes:
Floor Junction boxes are used to connect different raceways or conduits, carrying electric wires and data cables on the floor. They act as floor access outlets to facilitate pulling, laying, managing and maintaining of wires and cables. This allows connection of these wires and cables to desired devices.


Reducer:
Reducers are used to create offset reductions to suit particular site installation requirements. Reducers have the width reduction on the sides when viewed from the primary width. They are used for connecting bigger cable trays with the smaller ones in an effortless and suitable manner. At Hutaib Electricals these Reducers are available in perforations of different sizes to suit the client’s requirements


Unistrut:
Unistrut is a brand name of the construction material, strut channel. Functionally, strut channel is a series of threaded rod and metal channel used to form a ceiling-mounted support structure for anything from lighting, to injectors, to overhead system components. Unistrut Cable Tray Support Structures. Cable Tray systems are often used to support electric power, signal, control, instrumentation and communication cables used for power distribution and communication. Hutaib Electrical manufactures the best quality of Unistrut Channel.


Z Channel Accessories:
Z Channel is a kind of cable tray with holes on the bottom sheet for laying power and signal cables for the purpose of distributing electricity, signaling in industrial plants, departments and other industries. Hutaib Electricals offer a wide variety of Z angle trays, which is made of fine quality metal and alloy. These products are corrosion resistant and have high tensile strength. Our offered products are widely used in various industrial applications.
